abstract: The federal discrimination lawsuit, filed by the American Civil Liberties Union on Monday, concerns Imane Boudlal, who worked two years at the Storytellers Cafe at the Disneyland Resort.
snippet: The federal discrimination lawsuit, filed by the American Civil Liberties Union on Monday, concerns Imane Boudlal, who worked two years at the Storytellers Cafe at the Disneyland Resort.
lead_paragraph: A federal discrimination lawsuit filed on Monday against the Walt Disney Company by the American Civil Liberties Union contends that a Muslim woman was harassed and unfairly removed from her job after a dispute over her head scarf.

headline.main: Disney Is Sued Over Treatment of Muslim Employee Who Wears a Head Scarf
